title: Gold Outside the Treasury and Federal Reserve Banks for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1878-1914 (2)--Original Data, 1914-1949. First Of Month Data In Original Sources Are Presented Here As Of The End Of The End Of The Preceeding Month. Source: Computed By NBER From U.S. Treasury Department Data: Annual Reports Of The Treasurer, 1886 And Following Years; Circulation Statements Of U.S. Money, 1887 And Following.

This NBER data series m14131a appears on the NBER website in Chapter 14 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter14.html.

NBER Indicator: m14131a
